TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
You said we would meet inside the city, but instead I find you out here.
You said we would meet inside the city, but instead I find you out here.
You said we would meet inside the city, but instead I find you out here.
You said we would meet inside the city, but instead I find you out here.
I do not like cities. They make me... uneasy.
I do not like cities. They make me... uneasy.
I do not like cities. They make me... uneasy.
I do not like cities. They make me... uneasy.
Are you ready to head back to Bartonia with me?
Are you ready to head back to Bartonia with me?
Are you ready to head back to Bartonia with me?
Are you ready to head back to Bartonia with me?
In good time. I said there was something to be done first, and I will require your help to do it.
In good time. I said there was something to be done first, and I will require your help to do it.
In good time. I said there was something to be done first, and I will require your help to do it.
In good time. I said there was something to be done first, and I will require your help to do it.
Okay... but we have to make it fast. What is this task?
Okay... but we have to make it fast. What is this task?
Okay... but we have to make it fast. What is this task?
Okay... but we have to make it fast. What is this task?
I require your help to bring an evil Sorcerer, in the Skell Marshes, to justice.
I require your help to bring an evil Sorcerer, in the Skell Marshes, to justice.
I require your help to bring an evil Sorcerer, in the Skell Marshes, to justice.
I require your help to bring an evil Sorcerer, in the Skell Marshes, to justice.
My help? I've seen you fight - you are a master of both sword AND bow. Why do you require MY help?
My help? I've seen you fight - you are a master of both sword AND bow. Why do you require MY help?
My help? I've seen you fight - you are a master of both sword AND bow. Why do you require MY help?
My help? I've seen you fight - you are a master of both sword AND bow. Why do you require MY help?
This Sorcerer has a... pet. A giant Zombie that guards him. I cannot fight both of them. If you can hold the Zombie at bay, I will take care of the spellcaster.
This Sorcerer has a... pet. A giant Zombie that guards him. I cannot fight both of them. If you can hold the Zombie at bay, I will take care of the spellcaster.
This Sorcerer has a... pet. A giant Zombie that guards him. I cannot fight both of them. If you can hold the Zombie at bay, I will take care of the spellcaster.
This Sorcerer has a... pet. A giant Zombie that guards him. I cannot fight both of them. If you can hold the Zombie at bay, I will take care of the spellcaster.
I'll do my best. But after this, we must head north as quickly as possible.
I'll do my best. But after this, we must head north as quickly as possible.
I'll do my best. But after this, we must head north as quickly as possible.
I'll do my best. But after this, we must head north as quickly as possible.
When this Sorcerer is brought to justice, I am yours to command.
When this Sorcerer is brought to justice, I am yours to command.
When this Sorcerer is brought to justice, I am yours to command.
When this Sorcerer is brought to justice, I am yours to command.
